subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] ignore my last message--see this one on air vs  ear
msgSnippet: ... Yahoo allows the ability to block attachments if the moderators so desire. They have not set this feature, so I assume this group allows it. I understand
messageBody:
Michael Everson wrote:
>
>
> Please upload charts and do not send them in e-mail.
> --

Yahoo allows the ability to block attachments if the moderators so
desire. They have not set this feature, so I assume this group allows it.

I understand that attachments can contain viruses, but in this case, I
am obviously not a spammer, and since I made the chart myself it cannot
contain a virus, as opposed to something I just forwarded it. The
problem with uploading the file is it requires an extra step which many
posters won't bother to take.

But if the moderators wish no attachments, then I'll follow the rule.

regards

Paul
